title: External Communications and Outgoing Traffic from SkiaSharp
body:
We are using the SkiaSharp library in our Xamarin.Forms application. We identified the below site address and IP address hardcoded in the framework while performing the Static mobile application security test which revealed the following remote hosts in the application where the mobile application may send or receive data.

**Host 1:** purl.org:80 & **Ip address:** 207.241.239.242:80
**Host 2:** www.aiim.org:80 & **Ip address:** 199.60.103.225:80

Kindly let us know the purpose of those IPs and links used in the control to get approval from Security Testing.
